description: As a focal point in the movement for women's rights, International Women's Day (IWD) is celebrated on March 8th every year worldwide. The day marks a call to action for gender parity and acknowledging women's achievements throughout history and across the globe.

St Patrick's Day, on March 17th, honors one of Ireland's patron saints. Many Americans with Irish ancestry celebrate him on this day. Shamrocks and four-leaf clovers are used as St. Patrick's Day decor to commemorate the day.

Benito Juarez, national hero and president of Mexico (1861–1872),  is one of Mexico's most respected leaders. He made substantial changes and reforms to create a democratic federal republic. Benito Juarez' Birthday is celebrated every year in Mexico on March 21st.
